title: I heard that they tried to get you skins based off of what you play.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I'm not one to complain for sales but I did hear that the things that you get from "My Shop" was based off of what you play. Yet if you would want to search up what i play its none of these champions. I'll admit I am a support main so I'll give it that but I do believe it would be nice if I got something I play. (ex. Thresh, Morgana, Jhin, Leona, Naut)

replies.body: Your shop does it's best to get you skins related to the roles and champions you play, but it also has to taken into account the number of skins available across the board as well as which skins you currently own. For instance, if you already owned most of the skins for Thresh then it may not give you a discount on the one last skins you don't own yet. It does carry a wee bit of RNG with it still.
It's quite funny how you say that since I am a thresh main with all of the skins except Championship Thresh. (Just a question when will Championship Thresh be able to purchase?)

For instance, if you already owned most of the skins for Thresh then it may not give you a discount on the one last skins you don't own yet. It does carry a wee bit of RNG with it still.

I played Lucian a total of 2 times in the whole season. I played Vladimir exactly once. I have never played Jhin at all this season. All three are in "My Shop". Feelsbadman.
It sounds like the shop was able to pick up on the fact that you played ADC champs like Lucian and Jhin, but keep in mind Your Shop does still have a random factor built in.
